b: ^Violet: Congrats on your first win, Sunny! You and
^ did really good out there! You two make a pretty great team!
^Sunny: Thank you! You and Jellybeans were also amazing out there!
^Violet: Thanks. But I still think we have room for improvement…
^Violet: … So we’ll try even harder so we win next time!
^Sunny: I can’t wait for our next race!
^Sunny: I won again! I think I’m getting the hang of it.
^Sunny: Oh! Violet! Thank you for the advice! I feel like I’m starting to build a really strong connection with
^Violet: That’s awesome! It’s great to see you two enjoying racing so much.
^Sunny: We’re doing so well, I think we might even go for the championship!
^Violet: Is that so? Well you’re gonna have to give it your all, because you’re going to have to beat us too!
^ is quite the racer, Sunny! You gave me and Jellybeans a real run for our money.
^ aren’t stopping anytime soon! You’d best give it your all, too!
^Violet: Of course! Where’s the fun in racing without some friendly rivalry?
^Violet: I’ll be looking forward to our next race!
^Violet: Wow… You’ve finally won the biggest race on the island!
^Violet: You were amazing out there! Hahaha, we haven’t had to try that hard in a race in a while!
^Violet: You’re a really tough opponent Sunny, and so was
^Sunny: Thank you! I don’t think I could’ve done it without you and Jellybeans, though.
^Sunny: Your advice and Jellybeans’ cuteness really helped me keep my head in the right space.
^Violet: Aww, thank you. Now that you’ve won the biggest race, what are you going to do now, Sunny?
^Sunny: I’m not going to give up! My dream is to become the best Grom ever. I’ll train even harder and keep giving it my all, race after race.
^Violet: That’s some amazing spirit you have.
^Violet: Alright! I won’t let you overtake me more than you have! Double training for us, Jellybeans!
^Sunny: Good! I wouldn’t have it any other way.
^Violet: Hey, it’s OK! You don’t have to look so down. This was only your first race, not everyone gets the hang of it immediately.
^Violet: You should try learning more about
^ and what they like; compatibility is really important when it comes to racing!
^ and I were getting better at understanding each other.
^Violet: Hmm, there’s still probably stuff you don’t know about them, building a friendship with your Gremlin takes time.
^Sunny: I already thought we were pretty close… But it seems like I have a long way to go.
^Violet: Hey, don’t beat yourself up! You and
^ had fun and you learned something. That’s not bad if you ask me.
^Violet: There’s always more races to be had, so next time just give it your all!
^ didn’t win, but I saw both of you give it your all out there. Good effort.
^Sunny: Thank you. I guess we just need to work a little harder. I thought we were doing really good, but there are so many better teams out there.
^Violet: Hey, just because you two aren’t the star racing duo now doesn’t mean you’ll never make it.
^Violet: At the end of the day, this is just one race of many! What matters above all is the friendship you and
^Violet: As long as you remember that, you and
^ will be tearing up the track in no time!
^, let’s keep giving it our best!
^Sunny: As expected of the big leagues, that was really intense!
^Violet: I hear you. This race is rough. Even for Jellybeans.
^Sunny: Even though we didn’t win, I think I learned a lot from this race.
^Sunny: I cheered my heart out, but I heard you and the others cheer really loud as well.
^Sunny: Everyone’s trying so hard… I just need to keep at it, and try even harder.
^Violet: That’s an amazing mentality for a rookie.
^Violet: I can see it. You’re going to win big one day.
^Sunny: Aww, thank you. I know that you’re a winner, too, Violet. You’re definitely going to win all of your races!
^Violet: Well, there’s only one way to find out which of us is right.
^Violet: Congrats, Sunny. You’re winning more and more now, how does it feel?
^Sunny: I could get hooked on this! It feels great!
^Violet: Amazing. You sure have put in a lot of hard work. I can tell!
^Sunny: Thanks! You and Jellybeans were great out there as well. Let’s keep on giving it one hundred percent!
^Violet: Wow! You really one-upped me and Jellybeans this time, huh?
^Sunny: Yeah! Bring out the plates, because you just got served!
^Sunny: Sorry. I just wanted to try something corny.
^Violet: Haha, you’ve become a veteran Grom already.
^Violet: Well, you win some, you lose some. Cheer up, Sunny.
^Sunny: You’re right, I won’t let this get me down!
^Sunny: Rats! We lost! We were so close, too!
^Violet: I feel you. The closer you are to winning, the worse it feels when you lose.
^Sunny: Yeah… But being that close means our training is working! We’ll definitely do better in the next race!
^Violet: Well, that looked like quite the tumble. Reminds me of that time someone fell down a flight of stairs.
